message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and operations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $12,000 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product worth more than what you perceive its value to be at $8,000, while securing a significant discount compared to the market rate. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your business.
